import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import InstructorData from'../../../data/instructor/InstructorData.json';import{slugify}from'../../../utils/index';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CourseType=_ref=>{let{data,classes}=_ref;const indexOfInstructor=InstructorData.findIndex(function(instructor){return slugify(instructor.name)===slugify(data.instructor);});// const instructorThumb = InstructorData[indexOfInstructor].image;
const imageUrl=`${process.env.PUBLIC_URL}/assets/images/course/course-01/${data.image}`;const containerStyle={backgroundImage:`url(${imageUrl})`,backgroundSize:'cover',width:'100%',height:'100%',minHeight:'250px'};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`single-course style-2 bg-shade border-0  ${classes?classes:''}`,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"row g-0 align-items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-xl-5",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"course-thumb",style:containerStyle,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"category",children:data.categories.slice(0,1)})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-xl-7",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"course-content py-4 pt-xl-0",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"course-price",children:[data.price==='0'?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"price current-price",children:"Free"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"price current-price",children:["$",data.price]}),data.oldPrice&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"price old-price ",children:["$",data.oldPrice]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{className:"course-title mb-40",children:[" ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:process.env.PUBLIC_URL+`/course-details/${data.id}`,children:data.title})," "]})]})})]})});};export default CourseType;
